oai_dc:dc.dc:title: INTEGRATION OF MARINE SIMULATION IN HARBOUR DESIGN
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sand, Stig E.
Jensen, Ole Juul
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: harbor design
marine simulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The strong increase in the capabilities and efficiency of modern marine simulators are briefly outlined as the background for demonstrating the advantages of a much closer coordination of hydraulic and maritime oriented design work in relation to harbour planning and alteration. The interaction of the two disciplines and the implications on the final configuration of two different harbours are described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
